Day 1.*Morning*:
- 🏰 Visit the iconic Red Square, marveling at the grandeur of St. Basil's Cathedral.
- 🏙️ Stroll along Nikolskaya Street, admiring the colorful facades and vibrant atmosphere.
Day 1.*Afternoon*:
- 🏛️ Explore the Kremlin, the historical and political heart of Moscow.
- 🍴 Indulge in a traditional Russian lunch at Stolovaya No. 57.
Day 1.*Evening*:
- 🎭 Attend a world-class ballet or opera performance at the Bolshoi Theatre.
- 🍷 Sip on exquisite cocktails at a rooftop bar with panoramic city views.

Day 2.*Morning*:
- 🎨 Discover the soulful works of Russian masters at the State Tretyakov Gallery.
- 🌉 Cross the scenic Taganskiy Park Bridge for breathtaking views of the city skyline.
Day 2.*Afternoon*:
- 🇻🇦 Embark on a guided tour of the opulent Novodevichy Convent.
- 🎀 Shop for souvenirs and handicrafts at the Izmailovsky Market.
Day 2.*Evening*:
- 🇷🇺 Enjoy an authentic Russian dinner at Mari Vanna, known for its cozy atmosphere and traditional cuisine.
- 💃 Indulge in some lively dancing at the popular Glavclub.

Day 3.*Morning*:
- 🌿 Escape the hustle and bustle at Gorky Park, enjoying a peaceful stroll or bike ride.
- 🚇 Explore the vast underground world of the Moscow Metro, admiring its stunning architecture and artwork.
Day 3.*Afternoon*:
- 🛍️ Browse through designer boutiques and department stores along Tverskaya Street.
- 🍤 Savor a farewell lunch at the legendary Beluga Caviar Bar, known for its exquisite seafood delicacies.
Day 3.*Evening*:
- 🍾 Celebrate your Moscow adventure with a champagne toast at the Ritz-Carlton, overlooking the Kremlin.
- 🌃 Take a romantic walk through the illuminated Red Square, bidding farewell to this vibrant city.
